title: All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring
description:
The all-new Piazza Alta has been designed from the ground up to be a truly elevating city living experience. We offer studios to penthouses in a variety of layouts and stunning finishes. All apartments offer Brazilian oak hardwood flooring, oversized windows allowing abundant natural sunlight, ceiling fans in every room, washer/dryer in unit, plenty of closet space. Kitchens include custom cabinetry with soft-close drawers throughout, quartz counters, slab backslashes and mood setting under cabinet lighting. Bathrooms feature an exhilarating waterfall rain shower head with hand-held spray wands and body jets, shower benches and glass doors, illuminated medicine cabinets and storage vanities. Apartments can be found in the dark modern scheme Sleek design, the bright contemporary Scandinavian design or the warm Timeless design. There is absolutely no wrong way to live luxurious. Now let’s talk amenities. First, to say we have a pool would be modest. The Aqua Foro pool club is a 25k sq ft rooftop aquatic paradise. Lap and lounge pools, hot tubs, kitchens, cabanas and even a splash pad for the kids. Our 15k sq ft fitness and recovery center features state of the art equipment, Peloton bikes, a massive outdoor terrace, and residents can enjoy regular complimentary trainer-led fitness classes. Also, the fitness center offers relaxing “his and her” spas with high pressure showers, dry saunas, steam rooms, stand up tanning, and hydro massage beds. If you're looking for a refreshing atmosphere to finish up some work at home or meet up with friends look no further than our 5k sq ft cafe & lounge area. Enjoy a cup of coffee at the stylish diner booths, kick back on a comfortable couch with friends or take in beautiful city views from the outdoor terrace. Located in the beating heart of Northern Liberties just steps away from supermarkets, restaurants, bowling alleys, live music and comedy club venues. A few minutes from nearby highways granting quick and easy access to concerts, sporting events, shopping malls and everything downtown center city has to offer. From sunrise to sunset The Piazza Alta delivers a luxurious and invigorating lifestyle. Take the first step towards your own dream space by visiting us today. *LIMITED TIME PROMOS AVAILABLE. title: Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home!
description:
Call this 3-bedroom, 1-bath Bella Vista gem home! Blending vintage original details with a recent renovation and upgrades throughout, this home is on a quiet, postcard-perfect block that is just steps away from some of the city's best offerings. The first floor features two rooms that can be used interchangeably as either living or dining rooms depending on your preference, followed by a separate eat-in kitchen with enough space for a breakfast table. With Carrara marble floors and detailing, stainless steel appliances, a durable quartz countertop, and a decorative iron-lattice window, this kitchen is both spacious and well-appointed. Stairs lead up to the second floor where a roomy guest bedroom with its own closet, a renovated bathroom, and an extra open space that easily be used as an office, playroom, or den, with a convenient linen closet await. The large master bedroom with closet and a charming second guest bedroom top off the property on the third floor. Remote controlled ceiling fans and mid-century-style fixtures in the 3 bedrooms and living spaces add smart, efficient flare paired with contemporary hardware and original inlaid floors. Washer and dryer are provided in the unfinished basement, which also has plenty of room for storage. Four AC units are also provided for the renter's convenience. This residential family-friendly block is convenient to schools, as well as Whole Foods and Acme supermarkets, the 9th Street Market, and South Street. Saloon Restaurant and brunch favorite Fitzwater Cafe are right around the corner, as is John's Water Ice, Fiorella, Nomad Pizza, The Good King, Rally Coffee Shop, and so many more places to explore.
